## 2.1 Uniform Simulation

####  Page 41

```{r}
Nsim = 1000
x = runif(Nsim)
x1 = x[-Nsim]
x2 = x[-1]
par(mfrow = c(1,3))
hist(x)
plot(x1,x2)
acf(x)
```

#### Page 45

```{r}
Nsim = 1000
U = runif(Nsim)
X = -log(U)
Y = rexp(Nsim)
par(mfrow = c(1,2))
hist(X, freq = F, main = "Exp from Uniform")
hist(Y, freq = F, main = "Exp from R")
```
